train[source]

train(data_path:Path, epochs:int, lr:Union[float, str], frz:int=1, pre:int=800, re:int=256, bs:int=200, fold:int=4, smooth:bool=False, arch:str='resnet18', dump:bool=False, log:bool=False, mixup:float=0.0, fp16:bool=False, dls:DataLoaders=None, save:bool=False, pseudo:Path=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = train(DATA_PATH, epochs=0, lr=0.001, bs=256, log=False)

preds = torch.randn(5, 5)
labels = tensor([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]).unsqueeze(-1)
preds, labels.shape

train_cv[source]

train_cv(path:"Path to data dir", epochs:"Number of unfrozen epochs", lr:"Initial learning rate", frz:"Number of frozen epochs"=1, pre:"Image presize"=(682, 1024), re:"Image resize"=256, bs:"Batch size"=256, smooth:"Label smoothing?"=False, arch:"Architecture"='resnet18', dump:"Don't train, just print model"=False, log:"Log w/ W&B"=False, save:"Save model based on RocAuc"=False, mixup:"Mixup (0.4 is good)"=0.0, tta:"Test-time augmentation"=False, fp16:"Mixed-precision training"=False, eval_dir:"Evaluate model and save results in dir"=None, val_fold:"Don't go cross-validation, just do 1 fold (or pass 9 to train on all data)"=None, pseudo:"Path to pseudo labels to train on"=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
scores = np.ones((5, 4))
scores.mean(0)

array([1., 1., 1., 1.])
